panels.description: This made for sentry to be sure we always have 'n' peers connected no more no less. If amount of peers connected to validator drops by any number it mean we have one or more sentry disconnected. If for some reason amount of pears more then amount of sentry/relays connected this mean we are in trouble. Instance should be set strict to validator, grafana doesn't support variables in alers. Stabdart options > Max should be adjusted accordingly as well as tresholds colors. { advanced staff here, ignore if you don't know what to do or ask for support }
panels.title: [ Alert ] Connected Peers Rate

panels.description: This graph produce bump when validator miss block, instance should be set strict to validator, grafana doesn't support variables in alerts. Adjust treshold accordingly. Set alers in Alert section.
panels.title: [ Alert ] Validator Miss Block

panels.description: Chain Flow Alert, if it goes outside of the range we are in trouble. Currently check in 5 minutes range. Ajust everything according your prefered monitoring setup.
panels.title: [ Alert ] Chain Flow
